title: Multi.io
description:
Working closely with software development and testing team members to design and develop robust solutions to meet client requirements for functionality, scalability, and performance for the xchange project(turncoin.io marketing site - https://turncoin.io, xsport app, xsport backend).
        Writing test cases for new enhancements and issues for the xsport backend.
        Implementing news feed system for the xsport app.
        Implemented the turncoin.io marketing user pages and admin pages using React-Redux-Saga and Antd design.
        Implemented the turncoin.io marketing site backend.
details: Built a dashboard with various viz from multi databases.
